    • generateChart

      public static javafx.scene.chart.LineChart<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Number> generateChart​(javafx.scene.chart.LineChart<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Number> lineChart, CountryRecord countryRecord, long days, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> selectedCountries, char task)
      to add all the data in countryRecod to the chart
      Parameters:
      lineChart - the LineChart to add the data
      countryRecord - the countryRecord storing all the data
      days - the duration of the interested period in days
      selectedCountries - all the selected counties
      task - selected task
      Returns:
      return the LineChart with data added

    • makeASeries

      public static javafx.scene.chart.XYChart.Series<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Number> makeASeries​(long days, java.time.LocalDate currentDay, java.time.ZoneId zoneId, java.text.DateFormat df, CountryRecord countryRecord, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> selectedCountries, int i, char task, javafx.scene.chart.XYChart.Series<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Number> series)
      to add all the data of a specific county to a XYChart.Series
      Parameters:
      days - duration of interested period in days
      currentDay - the first date of the period
      zoneId - a ZoneId
      df - a DateFormat for displaying the dates
      countryRecord - the countryRecord that includes the records of the country
      selectedCountries - countries selected
      i - the index of the country to be added in the selectedCountry ArrayList
      task - selected task
      series - to be added with data
      Returns:
      series XYChart.Series with all the data of a specific county added

    • saveAsPng

      public static void saveAsPng​(javafx.scene.chart.LineChart<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Number> lineChart, java.io.File file) throws java.io.IOException
      this function saves a line chart as a png file in the designated location
      Parameters:
      lineChart - the LineChart in javafx to be saved
      file - path the relative path (of the project) to save the resulting png image
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
